name: FusionCharge 20,000mAh Portable Power Bank
description: Stay powered up on the go with the FusionCharge 20,000mAh Power Bank. Featuring fast charging technology, dual USB ports, and a sleek, lightweight design, it’s perfect for smartphones, tablets, and other USB devices. Built with safety protections against overcharging and overheating, this power bank ensures reliable performance wherever you are.
